title: Looking for a 3 people for Flex que, check description
body:
Looking for,
Top Lane Main - Silver+
Mid Lane Main - Silver +
Support Main - SIlver +

If any is interested add me xHeroborn or Crispus (adc), all players must have a want to improve and like working in a team situation we will be utilizing team comps so no one tricks thanks.

replies.body: I'm a support/top main, in silver. Happy to play either role. Can I add tomorrow? :)

Yea that fine 
- Look forward to hearing you
Btw which role would you prefer me to play? Top or support?
Turns out I can't add you today but I'll add you tomorrow     :)
Ok. Btw I also realised I won't be able to add you tomorrow but I'll add you the next day.

Added, support main.

Also have a friend who plays mid who could potentially be interested
